anathema: grant mercy to elves, plant trees, encourage natural plant growth
area_of_concern_raw: corruption of nature, pollution, and slaughter of elves
edict: corrupt plant life with evil or fungal influences, slay elves, feast on rotten flesh or fungus
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Restricted">[Treerazer (Lord of the Blasted Tarn)](/Deities.aspx?ID=324)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 159

[Treerazer](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3218) is worshipped by cultists throughout [the Inner Sea region](/Rules.aspx?ID=2069). The majority of these can be found within or near the expanse of the Tanglebriar, consisting of fungus-corrupted [fey](/Traits.aspx?ID=599), debased [elves](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=60), or other sinister demon worshippers. Beyond Tanglebriar, his cultists are rarer and tend to be loners or leaders of very small groups. Treerazer’s religious symbol is a bleeding dead tree that’s been split in half.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Demon Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=5)

**Edicts** corrupt plant life with evil or fungal influences, slay elves, feast on rotten flesh or fungus

**Anathema** grant mercy to elves, plant trees, encourage natural plant growth

**Area of Concern**
corruption of nature, pollution, and slaughter of elves

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Sanctification** must choose unholy

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)

**Favored Weapon** [Greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=376)

**Domains** [Destruction](/Domains.aspx?ID=71), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=85), [Nightmares](/Domains.aspx?ID=86), [Tyranny](/Domains.aspx?ID=96)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Decay](/Domains.aspx?ID=104)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=1548)

- **3rd**
[Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=1752)

- **6th**
[Tangling Creepers](/Spells.aspx?ID=1714)

</column>
name: Treerazer (Lord of the Blasted Tarn)
religious_symbol: axe stuck into a bleeding tree stump
